explanation_ar: الاسم الجامع لكل معاني الألوهية؛ هو الإله الحق المستحق للعبادة.
explanation_en: The name encompassing all meanings of divinity; the true God worthy of worship.

explanation_ar: الذي وسعت رحمته كل شيء وشملت جميع الخلق.
explanation_en: The One whose mercy encompasses everything and extends to all creation.

explanation_ar: الرحيم بعباده المؤمنين رحمة دائمة في الدنيا والآخرة.
explanation_en: The One who is especially merciful to His believers, granting continuous mercy in this world and the next.

explanation_ar: المالك لكل شيء والمتصرف في خلقه بأمره وحكمته.
explanation_en: The true owner of everything, who rules over creation by His command and wisdom.

explanation_ar: المنزه عن كل نقص وعيب والمطهر عن كل سوء.
explanation_en: The One free from all imperfections, pure from all evil and deficiency.

explanation_ar: الذي سلم من كل عيب ويمنح السلام لعباده.
explanation_en: The One who is free from all defects and grants peace and safety to His creation.

explanation_ar: الذي يؤمن عباده من الخوف ويصدق وعده.
explanation_en: The One who grants security and faith to His servants and fulfills His promises.

explanation_ar: الذي يراقب ويحفظ كل شيء ولا يغيب عنه شيء.
explanation_en: The One who watches over and protects all things; nothing escapes His knowledge.

explanation_ar: ذو العزة الذي لا يُغلب ولا يُقهر.
explanation_en: The All-Powerful who cannot be overcome or defeated.

explanation_ar: الذي يجبر كسر الضعفاء ويقهر الجبابرة الظالمين.
explanation_en: The One who mends the broken and subdues the arrogant oppressors.

explanation_ar: الذي له الكبرياء والعظمة، المتعالي عن صفات المخلوقين.
explanation_en: The One who possesses greatness and majesty, exalted above the attributes of creation.

explanation_ar: الذي أوجد الأشياء جميعها من العدم على غير مثال سابق.
explanation_en: The One who brings all things into existence from nothing, without precedent.

explanation_ar: الذي خلق الخلق على هيئاتهم المختلفة دون تفاوت.
explanation_en: The One who forms and fashions creation in perfect order and proportion.

explanation_ar: الذي أعطى كل مخلوق صورته وهيئته المميزة.
explanation_en: The One who gives every creation its distinct form and appearance.

explanation_ar: الذي يكثر من مغفرة الذنوب لعباده مع سترها.
explanation_en: The One who repeatedly forgives sins and covers faults.

explanation_ar: الذي يقهر الجبابرة والمتكبرين بعظمته وسلطانه.
explanation_en: The One who subdues tyrants and compels creation by His majesty and power.

explanation_ar: الذي يهب العطايا بلا عوض ويمنّ بالنعم بلا حساب.
explanation_en: The One who bestows gifts freely and grants blessings without limit.

explanation_ar: الذي يرزق خلقه جميعاً ما يحتاجونه، وييسر لهم أسباب الرزق.
explanation_en: The One who provides sustenance for all His creatures and facilitates their means of livelihood.

explanation_ar: الذي يفتح أبواب الرحمة والرزق، ويفصل بين عباده بالحق.
explanation_en: The One who opens the doors of mercy and provision and judges between His servants in truth.

explanation_ar: الذي يعلم كل شيء، لا يخفى عليه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء.
explanation_en: The One who knows everything; nothing is hidden from Him in the heavens or the earth.

explanation_ar: الذي يقبض الرزق والنعم عن من يشاء بحكمته وعدله.
explanation_en: The One who withholds sustenance and blessings from whom He wills, in His wisdom and justice.

explanation_ar: الذي يبسط الرزق والرحمة لعباده برحمته وفضله.
explanation_en: The One who expands provision and mercy to His servants out of His grace.

explanation_ar: الذي يخفض الجبابرة والمتكبرين ويذلهم بعد عز.
explanation_en: The One who lowers the arrogant and the tyrants, bringing them down from their pride.

explanation_ar: الذي يرفع أولياءه بالطاعة ويعلي قدرهم في الدنيا والآخرة.
explanation_en: The One who raises His righteous servants through obedience and elevates their ranks in this world and the next.

explanation_ar: الذي يمنح العز لمن يشاء من عباده بطاعته وكرامته.
explanation_en: The One who grants honor and dignity to whom He wills among His servants.

explanation_ar: الذي يذل من يشاء من عباده ويهينه بعدل حكمته.
explanation_en: The One who humiliates whom He wills, bringing disgrace with His perfect justice.

explanation_ar: الذي يسمع كل الأصوات على اختلاف لغاتها وحاجاتها.
explanation_en: The One who hears all sounds, in every language and at every moment.

explanation_ar: الذي يرى كل شيء ظاهرًا وباطنًا لا تخفى عليه خافية.
explanation_en: The One who sees everything, both the visible and the hidden; nothing escapes His sight.

explanation_ar: الذي يحكم بين خلقه بالعدل ولا يظلم أحدًا.
explanation_en: The One who judges between His creation with justice and never wrongs anyone.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يجور في حكمه ويضع الأمور مواضعها بالحق.
explanation_en: The One who is perfectly just, placing everything in its proper place and never wronging anyone.

explanation_ar: الذي يلطف بعباده في أمورهم، وييسر لهم مصالحهم من حيث لا يشعرون.
explanation_en: The One who is kind and gentle with His servants, making things easy for them in unseen ways.

explanation_ar: العالم بخفايا الأمور ودقائق الأشياء لا تخفى عليه خافية.
explanation_en: The One fully aware of all things, knowing the inner and hidden aspects of everything.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يعجل على عباده بالعقوبة مع قدرته عليهم.
explanation_en: The One who is patient and does not hasten punishment despite being fully capable of doing so.

explanation_ar: الذي له العظمة والكبرياء في ذاته وصفاته وأفعاله.
explanation_en: The One whose greatness and majesty belong to His essence, attributes, and actions.

explanation_ar: الذي يغفر الذنوب جميعاً لمن تاب وأناب.
explanation_en: The One who forgives all sins for those who repent and return to Him.

explanation_ar: الذي يثيب على العمل القليل أجراً عظيماً ويشكر عباده على طاعتهم.
explanation_en: The One who rewards even the smallest deeds with abundant blessings and appreciates His servants’ obedience.

explanation_ar: الذي علا بذاته وصفاته فوق كل شيء.
explanation_en: The One exalted above everything in His essence and attributes.

explanation_ar: الذي كبُر في ذاته وصفاته فلا شيء أعظم منه.
explanation_en: The One whose greatness surpasses all things; nothing is greater than Him.

explanation_ar: الذي يحفظ خلقه ويصونهم من السوء والضياع.
explanation_en: The One who protects and preserves His creation from harm and loss.

explanation_ar: الذي يوصل إلى كل مخلوق ما يقوته ويحفظ عليه حياته.
explanation_en: The One who provides every creature with what sustains and maintains its existence.

explanation_ar: الذي يكفي عباده ويحاسبهم بعدله على أعمالهم.
explanation_en: The One who is sufficient for His servants and who holds them accountable with perfect justice.

explanation_ar: الذي له صفات الجلال والعظمة والكمال.
explanation_en: The One who possesses majesty, greatness, and perfection.

explanation_ar: الذي يعطي بلا حدود ويكرم عباده بفضله وجوده.
explanation_en: The One who gives endlessly and honors His servants with His bounty and grace.

explanation_ar: الذي يراقب أحوال خلقه ولا يغيب عنه شيء.
explanation_en: The One who watches over all creation; nothing escapes His observation.

explanation_ar: الذي يجيب دعاء عباده إذا دعوه ويقضي حاجاتهم.
explanation_en: The One who answers the prayers of His servants and fulfills their needs.

explanation_ar: الذي وسع علمه ورحمته كل شيء.
explanation_en: The One whose knowledge and mercy encompass everything.

explanation_ar: الذي يضع الأشياء في مواضعها بحكمة بالغة.
explanation_en: The One who places everything in its proper place with perfect wisdom.

explanation_ar: الذي يحب عباده المؤمنين ويحبونه.
explanation_en: The One who loves His righteous servants and is loved by them.

explanation_ar: ذو المجد والشرف الكامل في ذاته وصفاته وأفعاله.
explanation_en: The One full of glory, honor, and perfection in His essence, attributes, and actions.

explanation_ar: الذي يبعث الخلق يوم القيامة ويحييهم بعد الموت.
explanation_en: The One who will resurrect creation on the Day of Judgment and bring them back to life.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يغيب عنه شيء، يشهد على خلقه بما يعملون.
explanation_en: The One who is ever-present and witnesses everything His creation does.

explanation_ar: الذي هو حق في ذاته وصفاته وأفعاله، ووعده حق.
explanation_en: The One whose existence, attributes, and promises are absolute truth.

explanation_ar: الذي يُفوَّض إليه الأمر كله، وهو الكفيل بأرزاق العباد وشؤونهم.
explanation_en: The One who is entrusted with all matters and manages the affairs of His creation.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يُغلب ولا يعجزه شيء، وهو مصدر القوة كلها.
explanation_en: The One who is never overcome, whose strength is absolute and unmatched.

explanation_ar: الثابت القوي الذي لا يتزعزع سلطانه ولا يتغير.
explanation_en: The One who is firm and steadfast; His power never weakens or falters.

explanation_ar: الذي يتولى عباده المؤمنين بالنصر والهداية والرعاية.
explanation_en: The One who protects, guides, and supports His faithful servants.

explanation_ar: المحمود على كل حال، المستحق للحمد والثناء على صفاته وأفعاله.
explanation_en: The One deserving of all praise for His attributes, actions, and decrees.

explanation_ar: الذي أحصى كل شيء عدداً ولا يغيب عنه شيء.
explanation_en: The One who knows and records everything in exact detail; nothing escapes His count.

explanation_ar: الذي أنشأ الخلق من العدم وابتدأهم بقدرته.
explanation_en: The One who originates all creation from nothing by His power.

explanation_ar: الذي يعيد الخلق بعد موتهم كما بدأهم أول مرة.
explanation_en: The One who restores creation after death, just as He originated them the first time.

explanation_ar: الذي يحيي الأجساد بعد موتها، ويحيي القلوب بنوره وهدايته.
explanation_en: The One who gives life to bodies after death and enlightens hearts with His guidance.

explanation_ar: الذي يميت الأحياء بقدرته متى شاء وكيف شاء.
explanation_en: The One who causes death to His creation whenever and however He wills.

explanation_ar: الذي له الحياة الكاملة الأبدية التي لا يعتريها موت ولا فناء.
explanation_en: The One who possesses complete and eternal life, unaffected by death or decay.

explanation_ar: القائم بنفسه المقيم لغيره، الذي يقوم عليه كل شيء.
explanation_en: The Self-Existing One who sustains and upholds all creation.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يعزب عنه شيء، ولا يحتاج إلى وسيلة ليعلم أو يجد.
explanation_en: The One who perceives and knows everything without need or effort.

explanation_ar: ذو المجد والكرم والعظمة، كثير الخير والإحسان.
explanation_en: The One full of glory, generosity, and greatness; abundant in goodness.

explanation_ar: الذي لا شريك له في ذاته ولا صفاته ولا أفعاله.
explanation_en: The One without partner in His essence, attributes, or actions.

explanation_ar: الذي يُقصد في الحوائج، الغني عن كل ما سواه.
explanation_en: The One who is sought for all needs and is self-sufficient from all creation.

explanation_ar: الذي يقدر على كل شيء ولا يعجزه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء.
explanation_en: The One who has full power over everything; nothing can overpower or limit Him.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يعجزه شيء، قدَّر الأشياء وأحكمها بقدرته.
explanation_en: The One who is able to do all things and has power over everything with perfect control.

explanation_ar: الذي يُقدِّم من يشاء بفضله، ويقرّب الطائعين.
explanation_en: The One who brings forward whomever He wills and draws His servants near by His grace.

explanation_ar: الذي يؤخر من يشاء بحكمته وعدله، ويؤجل الأمور في الوقت المناسب.
explanation_en: The One who delays or withholds by His wisdom and justice, and grants in due time.

explanation_ar: الذي ليس قبله شيء، الموجود أزلاً بلا بداية.
explanation_en: The One before whom there was nothing; the eternal without beginning.

explanation_ar: الذي ليس بعده شيء، الباقي أبدًا بلا نهاية.
explanation_en: The One after whom there is nothing; the everlasting without end.

explanation_ar: الذي ظهر وجوده للعقول بآثاره وأدلته، ولا شيء فوقه.
explanation_en: The One whose existence is evident through His signs; nothing is above Him.

explanation_ar: الذي لا تُدركه الأبصار ولا العقول، ولا شيء دونه.
explanation_en: The One who is hidden from sight and beyond human comprehension; nothing is closer than Him.

explanation_ar: الذي يتولى أمر خلقه ويدبر شؤونهم بحكمته.
explanation_en: The One who manages and governs the affairs of creation with wisdom.

explanation_ar: الذي تعالى عن صفات المخلوقين، وارتفع فوق كل نقص.
explanation_en: The One who is far above the attributes of creation and exalted beyond all imperfections.

explanation_ar: الذي يحسن إلى عباده برحمة ولطف، ويمتنّ عليهم بفضله.
explanation_en: The One who is kind and gracious to His creation, bestowing upon them goodness and mercy.

explanation_ar: الذي يوفق عباده للتوبة ويقبلها منهم مهما عظمت ذنوبهم.
explanation_en: The One who enables His servants to repent and accepts their repentance no matter how great their sins.

explanation_ar: الذي ينتقم من الظالمين بعدله في الوقت الذي يشاء.
explanation_en: The One who justly punishes the oppressors and wrongdoers in due time.

explanation_ar: الذي يمحو الذنوب ويتجاوز عن السيئات بكرمه ولطفه.
explanation_en: The One who erases sins and pardons the faults of His servants with generosity.

explanation_ar: الذي بلغ في رحمته ولطفه غاية الكمال بعباده.
explanation_en: The One whose mercy and gentleness toward His servants reach the utmost degree of perfection.

explanation_ar: الذي له ملك السماوات والأرض، يتصرف فيهما كما يشاء.
explanation_en: The One who owns and rules over all dominion and disposes of it as He wills.

translation_en: The Lord of Majesty and Generosity
explanation_ar: ذو العظمة والكمال والجود والكرم على عباده.
explanation_en: The One who possesses majesty, perfection, and generosity toward His creation.

explanation_ar: الذي يقيم العدل في خلقه ولا يظلم أحداً.
explanation_en: The One who establishes justice among His creation and never wrongs anyone.

explanation_ar: الذي يجمع الخلائق ليوم لا ريب فيه، ويجمع الأمور المتفرقة بحكمته.
explanation_en: The One who gathers creation on the Day of Judgment and brings together scattered things by His wisdom.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يحتاج إلى أحد، وكل الخلق فقراء إليه.
explanation_en: The One who is free of all needs, while all creation depends on Him.

explanation_ar: الذي يغني من يشاء من عباده ويكفيهم بفضله.
explanation_en: The One who enriches whomever He wills and suffices them by His bounty.

explanation_ar: الذي يمنع البلاء أو العطاء لحكمةٍ يعلمها، ويمنع الشر عن عباده.
explanation_en: The One who prevents harm or withholding of provision out of His wisdom and mercy.

explanation_ar: الذي بيده الضر والنفع، يبتلي من يشاء بعدله.
explanation_en: The One who allows harm or adversity to occur by His justice and wisdom.

explanation_ar: الذي يمنح الخير والنفع لعباده وييسر لهم أسباب الرحمة.
explanation_en: The One who grants benefit and goodness to His creation and facilitates mercy for them.

explanation_ar: الذي بنوره اهتدى المهتدون، وهو منوّر السماوات والأرض.
explanation_en: The One by whose light the believers are guided; He is the illuminator of the heavens and the earth.

explanation_ar: الذي يهدي القلوب إلى الحق ويوفق عباده إلى الصراط المستقيم.
explanation_en: The One who guides hearts to truth and directs His servants to the straight path.

explanation_ar: الذي خلق الخلق على غير مثال سابق، ولا شبيه له.
explanation_en: The One who created creation without precedent and has no equal or likeness.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يزول ولا يفنى، الدائم الباقي بعد فناء الخلق.
explanation_en: The One who remains and never perishes; the everlasting after all creation has ceased.

explanation_ar: الذي يرث الأرض ومن عليها، ويبقى بعد فناء جميع الخلق.
explanation_en: The One who remains after all creation perishes and to whom all possessions return.

translation_en: The Guide to the Right Path
explanation_ar: الذي يرشد عباده إلى الصواب، ويهديهم إلى ما فيه صلاحهم.
explanation_en: The One who guides His servants toward righteousness and directs them to what benefits them.

explanation_ar: الذي لا يعجل على عباده بالعقوبة، بل يمهلهم برحمته ويصبر على معاصيهم.
explanation_en: The One who does not hasten punishment for His servants but grants them time and shows immense patience despite their disobedience.
